scripts.install:all: npm run install:front & npm run install:auth & npm run install:solution
scripts.generate:auth: cd auth-service && npx prisma migrate dev --name "Setup auth db"
scripts.seed:auth: cd auth-service && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:auth: npm run generate:auth && npm run seed:auth
scripts.start:prod: npm run start:front & npm run start:auth-prod & npm run start:solution-prod
scripts.start:dev: npm run start:front & npm run start:auth-dev & npm run start:solution-dev
